summary: A Flax implementation of a Stable Diffusion pipeline that transforms textual prompts into images by encoding text with a CLIP model, generating latent representations with a conditional UNet, decoding them with a VAE, and optionally filtering results through a safety checker.
business_intent: Provide an end‑to‑end, JAX‑compatible solution for developers and enterprises to create high‑quality, AI‑generated images from text while ensuring content safety and easy integration into production workflows.
